```{r}
#| label: printing-fuctions
#| echo: false

wrap_li <- function(text = "text", fa = "fas fa-graduation-cap") {
  li <- paste0("<li><i class='fa-li ", fa, "'></i>", text, "</li>\n")
  return(li)
}

print_list <- function(text = "text", fa = "fas fa-graduation-cap") {
  open_ul  <- "<ul class='ul-edu fa-ul'>"
  close_ul <- "</ul>"
  items    <- wrap_li(text, fa)

  cat(paste0(open_ul, "\n"), items, paste0("\n", close_ul))
}

```

#### Montclair State University

<p align="justify">
Hi! I'm Cristian, a PhD student at Montclair State University in Montclair, NJ. I study Human-Robot Collaborative Disassembly (HRCD) for End-of-Life Products (EoLP), focused on e-waste. I'm particularly interested in the management of e-waste, and its disassembly to incorporate back into manufacturing, also known as circular economy. This research spans environmental sustainability and advancement of Human-Robot Collaboration (HRC).
